TextView.android:text:
This is E-Business project made by Kumar Vinay (13MT10013) and Veetrag Deora (13MT10041).
 As part of the project we have built an android app based buy-out model for a pseudo ecommerce website. 

This app makes your shopping hassle free, with purchase made possible within few clicks. The user's history gets stored, it further can be analysed which in turn will help create us a better customised recommendation system for the user.
 

Thanks 
 

Kumar Vinay and Veetrag Deora
